DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to look at the preliminary safety profile of an investigational drug in children 3 to 6 months of age with bronchiolitis.
DOC.brief_title: PK Study in 3- to 6- Month-Old Children (0476-268)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Active bronchiolitis or a history of bronchiolitis and asthmalike symptoms Exclusion Criteria : A history of any significant illness that will pose additional risk to the patient
